an9.39:1.2: Tasmim kho pana, bhikkhave, sangame asura jinimsu, deva parajayimsu.
an9.39:1.3: Parajita ca, bhikkhave, deva apayimsuyeva uttarenabhimukha, abhiyimsu asura.
an9.39:1.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, deva asurehi sangamesum.
an9.39:1.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurava jinimsu, deva parajayimsu.
an9.39:1.9: Parajita ca, bhikkhave, deva apayimsuyeva uttarenabhimukha, abhiyimsu asura.
an9.39:2.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, deva asurehi sangamesum.
an9.39:2.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asurava jinimsu, deva parajayimsu.
an9.39:2.6: Parajita ca, bhikkhave, deva bhita devapuramyeva pavisimsu.
an9.39:2.8: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho dani mayam etarahi attana viharama akaraniya asurehi’ti.
an9.39:2.10: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho dani deva etarahi attana viharanti akaraniya amhehi’ti.
an9.39:3.2: Tasmim kho pana, bhikkhave, sangame deva jinimsu, asura parajayimsu.
an9.39:3.3: Parajita ca, bhikkhave, asura apayimsuyeva dakkhinenabhimukha, abhiyimsu deva.
an9.39:3.7: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asura devehi sangamesum.
an9.39:3.8: Dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, deva jinimsu, asura parajayimsu.
an9.39:3.9: Parajita ca, bhikkhave, asura apayimsuyeva dakkhinenabhimukha, abhiyimsu deva.
an9.39:4.4: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, asura devehi sangamesum.
an9.39:4.5: Tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, deva jinimsu, asura parajayimsu.
an9.39:4.6: Parajita ca, bhikkhave, asura bhita asurapuramyeva pavisimsu.
an9.39:4.8: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho dani mayam etarahi attana viharama akaraniya devehi’ti.
an9.39:4.10: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho dani asura etarahi attana viharanti akaraniya amhehi’ti.
an9.39:5.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yasmim samaye bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati,
an9.39:5.2: tasmim, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evam hoti:
an9.39:5.3: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho danaham etarahi attana viharami akaraniyo marassa’ti.
an9.39:5.5: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho dani bhikkhu etarahi attana viharati akaraniyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:6.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam …
an9.39:6.4: tasmim, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhussa evam hoti:
an9.39:6.5: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho danaham etarahi attana viharami akaraniyo marassa’ti.
an9.39:6.7: ‘bhiruttanagatena kho dani bhikkhu etarahi attana viharati, akaraniyo mayhan’ti.
an9.39:7.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
an9.39:7.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakasi maram, apadam vadhitva maracakkhum adassanam gato papimato tinno loke visattikan’ti.
an9.39:8.1: Yasmim, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.2: sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.3: sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati …
an9.39:8.4: sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
an9.39:8.5: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu antamakasi maram, apadam vadhitva maracakkhum adassanam gato papimato tinno loke visattikan’”ti.
